edu.ncsu.csc216.carrental.model.management

Class NuxCarRental

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.carrental.model.management.NuxCarRental
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RentalLocation, RentalStateManager

    public class NuxCarRental
extends java.lang.Object
implements RentalLocation, RentalStateManager
    Class representing the manager for our car rental program. This class is responsible for translating UI interaction into program actions
    Version:
    1.0 (April 14, 2015)
    Author:
    Adams Ombonga (amombong)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NuxCarRental()
      Constructor method for this class that is called if no text file is found
      NuxCarRental(java.util.Scanner scan)
      Constructor method for this class that is called when a text file is found.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addCar(Car c)
      Method used to complete UI interaction and add a car to the available stack of cars that can be rented

      Method used to complete UI interaction and add customers to the customer queue.

      Method used to return a String containing the current cars that are available for rental
      void completeDetailing()
      Method used to remove the first car from the detail queue and place it onto the available stack because detailing is complete
      void completeRepairs()
      Method used to remove the first car from the repair queue and place it onto the detailing queue because repairs have been completed

      Method used to return a String containing the current customers waiting to rent a car

      Method used to return a String containing the current cars waiting to be detailed

      Method used to complete UI interaction of adding a new car to the available stack of cars, making it available for renting.
      void processRental()
      Method used to rent the next available car to the first waiting customer by removing the first customer and assigning it to the state of the first removed car

      Method used to process the return of a car with problems.

      Method used to process the return of a car with no problems.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NuxCarRental

        public NuxCarRental()
        Constructor method for this class that is called if no text file is found

      • NuxCarRental

        public NuxCarRental(java.util.Scanner scan)
        Constructor method for this class that is called when a text file is found. The passed scanner parameter contains the loaded text file that will be traversed and used to create car objects for our car rental programs inventory
        Parameters:
        scan - Scanner used to traverse text file.

        Method used to complete UI interaction and add a car to the available stack of cars that can be rented

      • processRental

        public void processRental()
        Method used to rent the next available car to the first waiting customer by removing the first customer and assigning it to the state of the first removed car
        Specified by:
        processRental in interface RentalStateManager

      • processReturn

        public void processReturn(boolean problem)
        Method used to process the return of the first car in the rented list of cars. This method depends upon whether a problem was reported or not. If a problem is reported the car is sent to the repair shop otherwise it goes to the detail shop
        Specified by:
        processReturn in interface RentalStateManager
        Parameters:
        problem - boolean used to determine if the rented car was returned with a problem

      • processDetailed

        public void processDetailed()
        Method used to process the first car in the detail shop in order to make it available. The car is removed from the detail shop queue and placed into the available stack.
        Specified by:
        processDetailed in interface RentalStateManager

      • processRepaired

        public void processRepaired()
        Method used to process the first car that was out for repair and send it for detailing. The car is removed from the the repair ship queue and placed into the detail shop queue
        Specified by:
        processRepaired in interface RentalStateManager

      • processNewCar

        public void processNewCar(java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String make,
                          java.lang.String model,
                          java.lang.String color)
        Method used to complete UI interaction of adding a new car to the available stack of cars, making it available for renting. If this car's fleet number matches another car which is already in the available stack then it is not added
        Specified by:
        processNewCar in interface RentalStateManager
        Parameters:
        id - the fleet number for the new car
        make - the make for this new car
        model - the model for this new car
        color - the color of this new car
        Throws:
        InvalidIDException - thrown if the fleet number for the new car is invalid

      • writeData

        public void writeData(java.io.Writer writer)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Method used to save the current inventory from our Car Inventory into a user specified file that is comma separated for each car parameter from the inventory
        Specified by:
        writeData in interface RentalLocation
        Parameters:
        writer - used to receive the information and write it to a specified file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurs while creating/writing the output file.
